DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial investigate whether nonsteroid anti-inflammatory drop therapeutic effect moderate severe dry eye patients.And compare efficacy two nonsteroid anti-inflammatory drop topical corticosteroid .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Nonsteroidal Anti-inflammatory Drugs Treatment Moderate Severe Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: moderate severe dry eye syndrome tear film breakup time ＞0 second ≤5 second , schirmer test ( anaesthesia ) ≥2mm/5min ≤5mm/5min corneal staining≥3 score allergic composition drug experiment previous use antiinflammatory drug immunosuppressive agent viral , bacterial fungal infection eye eyelid anomaly glaucoma high IOP significant meibomian gland dysfunction
